text.section: The Association consists of all insurers except for the Fund that are licensed to write on a direct basis motor vehicle liability insurance or motor vehicle physical damage insurance in the State.
As a condition of its authority to write motor vehicle liability insurance or motor vehicle physical damage insurance in the State, an insurer must be and remain an Association member.
